data.text:
John Steinbeck (1902 - 1968), American author and Nobel Prize winner (1962). Steinbeck is known for such novels as "Of Mice and Men", "The Grapes of Wrath" and "East of Eden". Photographed at his home on Bluff Point in Sag Harbor, Long Island, New York, 1961.

Captions are provided by our contributors.
